Instruction: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs using a wire whisk. Incorporate the milk, flour, sugar, salt, and melted butter.

Preheat a non-stick electric skillet over medium heat. Pour a thin layer of batter onto the skillet and spread it to the edges. Cook until the top surface looks dry. Cut into 2 or 4 sections and flip with a spatula. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until golden brown. Roll each pancake and serve.
